param.name: mode
param.label: Mode
param.description: Select the activity action mode.

param.name: method
param.label: Method
param.description: Select the activity action method. Delete will load by owner, type, item, subtype and parent if supplied.

param.name: stream
param.label: Stream
param.description: Select the type of stream to display.

param.name: source
param.label: Source
param.description: Optionally input the substitution supported stream source (e.g. profile, recent, module).

param.name: type
param.label: Type
param.description: Optionally input the substitution supported type. Note this is required for all modes except Stream and Delete method.

param.name: subtype
param.label: Sub-Type
param.description: Optionally input the substitution supported subtype.

param.name: title
param.label: Title
param.description: Optionally input substitution supported title.

param.name: message
param.label: Message
param.description: Optionally input substitution supported message.

param.name: item
param.label: Item
param.description: Optionally input the substitution supported item id.

param.name: parent
param.label: Parent
param.description: Optionally input the parent id.

param.name: owner
param.label: Owner
param.description: Input substitution supported owner as single integer user_id. Leave blank to use trigger user as the owner.

param.name: date
param.label: Date
param.description: Optionally input the activity datetime. If left blank will be the datetime the action triggered.

param.name: id
param.label: Action
param.description: Optionally select an action.

param.name: message
param.label: Message
param.description: Input a substitution supported message for this action.

param.name: emote
param.label: Emote
param.description: Optionally select the emote.

param.name: id
param.label: Location
param.description: Optionally select a location.

param.name: place
param.label: Place
param.description: Input the substitution supported place for this location.

param.name: address
param.label: Address
param.description: Optionally input the substitution supported address for this location.

param.name: type
param.label: Type
param.description: Input the substitution supported link type. Type determines how the link will display.

param.name: url
param.label: URL
param.description: Input the substitution supported link URL for this link.

param.name: internal
param.label: Internal
param.description: Enable or disable internal link. Internal links will suppress the display of the URL.

param.name: text
param.label: Text
param.description: Optionally input a substitution supported text for this link. This will be displayed instead of the URL.

param.name: title
param.label: Title
param.description: Optionally input a substitution supported title for this link.

param.name: description
param.label: Description
param.description: Optionally input a substitution supported description for this link.

param.name: thumbnail
param.label: Thumbnail
param.description: Enable or disable display of URL thumbnail.

param.name: custom
param.label: Custom
param.description: Optionally input a substitution supported custom media display.

param.name: url
param.label: URL
param.description: Input the substitution supported media URL (e.g. URL to an image, video, or audio file)

param.name: mimetype
param.label: MimeType
param.description: Input the substitution supported media mimetype (e.g. image/jpeg, video/youtube). This is necessary for video and audio media.

param.name: extension
param.label: Extension
param.description: Input the substitution supported media extension (e.g. jpg).

param.name: display
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of comments for this activity entry. Note a stream that has comments disabled will not display comments regardless of this setting.

param.name: source
param.label: Source
param.description: Select the comments source. Source determines what the comments will be linked to. This allows comments to carry over from activity to activity or outside of activity it self. Object source can only be used if an Item is specified.

param.name: display
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of tags for this activity entry. Note a stream that has tags disabled will not display tags regardless of this setting.

param.name: source
param.label: Source
param.description: Select the tags source. Source determines what the tags will be linked to. This allows tags to carry over from activity to activity or outside of activity it self. Object source can only be used if an Item is specified.

param.name: display
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable display of replies for this comment entry. Note a stream that has replies disabled will not display replies regardless of this setting.

param.name: output
param.label: Output
param.description: Select how to output the stream display.

param.name: activity_direction
param.label: Direction
param.description: Select the direction the stream displays.

param.name: activity_create_access
param.label: Create Access
param.description: Select status post create access. Access determines who can post status activity. Moderators are exempt from this configuration unless disabled.

param.name: activity_message_limit
param.label: Message Limit
param.description: Input number of characters a status message can have. If blank allow unlimited character limit. Moderators are exempt from this configuration. Leave empty for same as global.

param.name: activity_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: activity_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed. Leave empty for same as global.
